title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\DemoteMasterContext
name: DemoteMasterContext
description:
Database instance demote primary instance context.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.DemoteMasterContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.verify_gtid_consistency
params.description: Verify GTID consistency for demote operation. Default value: True. Second Generation instances only. Setting this flag to false enables you to bypass GTID consistency check between on-premises primary instance and Cloud SQL instance during the demotion operation but also exposes you to the risk of future replication failures. Change the value only if you know the reason for the GTID divergence and are confident that doing so will not cause any replication issues.

params.name: data.master_instance_name
params.description: The name of the instance which will act as on-premises primary instance in the replication setup.

params.name: data.replica_configuration
params.description: Configuration specific to read-replicas replicating from the on-premises primary instance.
